title: runtime: Stack returns the empty string
body:
runtime.Stack is broken. It returns 0 from Stack(buf, false) and doesn't write any data
to the buffer either.

Mathieu reports it was broken by
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2dae02db5c70c3402ce8c09c26474acce41be29a
and caught by Camlistore's buildbot (which has a builder testing against Go tip)
